name: doppler
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing doppler cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`doppler` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-doppler).

dopplerToken.description: A Doppler token, either a personal or service token

verifyTls.description: Whether or not to verify TLS

provider.description:
The provider type for the doppler package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
